name: Immigrate to Distrito Federal
description: The Federal District of Brazil, home to Brasília, is the nation's political center and a UNESCO-listed planned city. Known for Oscar Niemeyer's modernist architecture, high living standards, and a strong public-sector economy, it serves as a hub for diplomacy, government, and innovation.
keywords: Federal District, Brasília, Central-West, candango, cerrado, Oscar Niemeyer, Paranoá Lake, National Congress
